DOC.brief_title: Imaging Modalities Detection Coronary Artery Disease End-Stage Renal Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Primary : To examine ability dobutamine stress dobutamine stress echocardiography real time perfusion ( DSE RTCE ) coronary compute tomographic angiography ( cCTA ) detect anatomically significant coronary artery disease ( CAD ) define quantitative coronary angiography end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) patient Secondary : To identify test predictive patient outcomes . This pilot study enrol 75 participant . This base obtain 80 % power 90 % rectangular confidence region sensitivity specificity use one-sided confidence limit , correspond two 95 % univariate confidence interval ( one sensitivity one specificity ) . With 73 patient screen total 80 % power form 90 % rectangular confidence region around 90 % sensitivity 90 % specificity , exclude sensitivity less 69 % specificity le 73 % . We believe sensitivity specificity DSE RTCE cCTA within confidence region .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diabetes mellitus 2 . Patients undergo kidney transplant evaluation . 3 . Currently hemodialysis 4 . Adults 1965 year age 5 . Written inform consent participant deem medically competent principal investigator , secondary investigator , participate personnel write II.26 ( b ) 6 . Male female 1 . Previous history percutaneous coronary intervention 2 . Coronary artery bypass surgery 3 . Prior myocardial infarction AMI ( troponin great 1.0 ) within 48 hour test 4 . Atrial ventricular arrhythmia control heart rate < 65 beat per minute 5 . Known allergy iodinate contrast 6 . Decompensated Congestive Heart failure 7 . Acute respiratory failure manifest sign symptom carbon dioxide retention hypoxemia 8 . Pregnant ( base history/information obtain patient ) 9 .
